verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: claimed] [ARG1: that Canadians are sneaking into the US and smuggling goods across the border to avoid high Canadian tariffs] . But tariff data shows a different story .
President Donald Trump claimed that Canadians [V: are] sneaking into the US and smuggling goods across the border to avoid high Canadian tariffs . But tariff data shows a different story .

President Donald Trump claimed that [ARG0: Canadians] are [V: sneaking] [ARG1: into the US] and smuggling goods across the border [ARGM-PNC: to avoid high Canadian tariffs] . But tariff data shows a different story .

President Donald Trump claimed that [ARG0: Canadians] are sneaking into the US and smuggling goods across the border to [V: avoid] [ARG1: high Canadian tariffs] . But tariff data shows a different story .

President Donald Trump claimed that Canadians are sneaking into the US and smuggling goods across the border to avoid high Canadian tariffs . But [ARG0: tariff data] [V: shows] [ARG1: a different story] .
